messages.title: In the General Election your vote in this constituency is vital
messages.content: As the real choice for Labour here, a majority of more than 5,000 can see the Conservatives win. Only Labour has the strength to win against the Tories. The Greens held this seat previously, but cannot win it this time around in the South East.
Only Labour can stop the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The government has intervened to steer the economy through the recession and will create a low carbon economy with investment in Flood Defences, Railways, High-Speed Broadband and Green IT Jobs
Labour is creating a Sure Start Children's Centre in every community to help transform the life chances of our under fives

Labour has provided 89,000 more nurses, 44,000 more doctors. The NHS now has the shortest waiting lists ever and GP practices are open for longer for working families and will be brought in front by 48 hours

mentions.candidate: Nancy Platts - Labour Candidate, Brighton Pavilion
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can stop the Conservatives.

issues.economy: The government has intervened to steer the economy through the recession and will create a low carbon economy with investment in Flood Defences, Railways, High-Speed Broadband and Green IT Jobs
issues.education: Labour is creating a Sure Start Children's Centre in every community to transform the life chances of the under fives
issues.health: Labour has provided 89,000 more nurses, 44,000 more doctors. The NHS now has the shortest waiting lists ever and GP practices are open for longer for working families and will be brought in front by 48 hours.

images.caption: Nancy Platts, Labour Party Candidate for Brighton Pavilion
